recipesJson.name: Creamy root beer
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: Started out trying to make a rootbeer float recipe never quite got there. It did turn out to be a excellent A&W style root beer. Pretty good as a shake and vape but better after a week.

reviews.text: He only used a relatively small amount of FW Root Beer in there, especially compared to the other ingredients, some of which look like odd choices. But it really works. I get a sort of foamy head, I’m guessing from the way the cupcake and meringue works in there. Turns out there’s more than one way to skin an effervescence. I still really prefer Barq’s root beer over A&W and Mug, but if you’re an A&W man or woman, this might hit the spot. The only thing I can say by way of critique is that it seems to vape a little warm for a root beer. FW is already short on wintergreen compared to other root beers and without it, this could use some cooling of some kind.
You did well with this. Tastes like a A&W fountain root beer float from the restaurant. I will be making this again.
